events.message: I received the wrong size of the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund since the customer is requesting their money back for the incorrect size.
Assigning the refund request case to agent Mike for further handling and resolution.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I understand you want a refund for the wrong jacket size you received.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unopened or has any tags removed?
My order number is 789456123, and the jacket is unopened with all tags intact as I just received it today.
Thank you for the info! We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label via email.
Great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the return label.
The refund process is now underway, and you should receive confirmation once the return is processed successfully.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing your case as the refund has been completed. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
We have sent a brief survey to gather your feedback on our service during your refund process.
